BlazerTech Character Management System
Table of Contents

Character Creator

The Character Creator is a modular system for building in-game Character Creation Menus.
Combine Layer Selectors, Previews, and History Panels to create a menu tailored to your game.

Layer Selectors

A Layer Selector changes one layer of a Layered Character.
Common selector types:

Selector Description
Dropdown Standard dropdown listing all options.
Carousel Shows the current option with arrows to cycle left/right.
Grid Grid of preview images; click to apply.
List Scrollable list, optionally with preview images.
Tab Switches another selector to a chosen layer.

Character Preview

Displays the active character as edits are made:

  • Static Sprite – Shows the base sprite, updated with layers.
  • Animated – Plays animations via the Character Type’s Animator Controller.
  • Animation Swapping – Auto-generated buttons to switch between defined animations.
  • Rotate – Buttons cycle through different angles/views.

Character History

The CCM History Tracker records every change as a Snapshot.

  • Limit: 1–100 snapshots (default = 30).
  • Option to preserve the first snapshot.

Undo / Redo

Use CCM Undo/Redo Button Handler to wire UI buttons for undo/redo.

History Panels

Show snapshots in a panel for quick reverts:

Panel Type Description
Text Lists what changed (vertical).
Sprite Shows preview sprites (horizontal).
Hybrid Combines text + sprite.

Other Features

  • Mid-Play Editing – Edit active characters; changes apply instantly.
  • Optional Display Name – Add a text field for custom names.
  • Reset Button – Restores character to its initial state when the menu opened.
